```py
peft_config = LoraConfig(
        lora_alpha=64,
        lora_dropout=0.1,
        r=16,
        bias="none",
        task_type="CAUSAL_LM",
        target_modules= ['k_proj', 'q_proj', 'v_proj', 'o_proj']
)
```

```py
trainer = DPOTrainer(
    model,
    model_ref,
    args=training_arguments,
    beta=0.5,
    peft_config=peft_config,
    train_dataset=dataset_train_dpo,
    eval_dataset=dataset_test_dpo,
    tokenizer=tokenizer,
    loss_type='ipo'
)
```
